title: Venus Affairs - Forbidden Fruit: Mission 5
description: After a steamy hook up with a fellow crew woman the night before, Petty Officer Quorra Price of the Starship Venus is sent on a standard planet touch-down mission but falls prey to the erotic effects of a fruit the planet's creatures use for sexual reproduction. But when she's brought back on board the Venus for examination in the medbay and discovers she's grown a penis, it's Quorra who gets to play doctor.  The missions of The Venus Affairs are erotic short stories which involve intense romantic and sexual encounters between the women of the Starship Venus and all manner of alien species throughout the universe. This explicit content is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Abbi Aaker
